name: Jungle Bomb Fever
description:
Jungle bomb fever is an action arcade game with RPG elements.
Kenshin Island was captured by a large enemy army. Strategically important object
it was entrusted to release the best squad, the leader of which you were once.
During the execution of the combat mission, only one soldier remained in the detachment, armed with a grenade launcher and, practically,
without a chance of victory. Will he be able to complete this task alone, proving that all this way was
not in vain? Can he just survive? The answer to this question can only be given by you.

In the game you have to fight off numerous waves of the enemy, shooting them with bombs from a grenade launcher.
The goal of the game is to hold out as long as possible and pump the main character to the maximum.

Use the arrows or WASD to move.
The left mouse button is a shot.

Features of the game:
- Nice graphics.
- Hero leveling system.
